tag_list: ian-khan, marketing-toronto, marketing-professional, marketicious, toronto-marketeer, toronto-marketing-professional, toronto-marketing-expert, toronto-brnd-expert, toronto-branding-expert, toronto-brand-management, toronto-branding
overview:
Ian Khan is a Marketing, Branding & PR business leader based in Toronto, Canada. He is one of the founders of niche Marketing agency Marketicious, specializing in Brand Management and Ethnic Marketing.

Ian has worked with international organizations in the Middle East, United States and Canada and has led teams focused on Marketing Communications, Brand Management and Events. As a writer and journalist, he has also contributed to industry leading magazines such as for AfrOil - Africa Oil & Gas Monitor , GLNG - Global LNG Monitor, NorthAmOil - North America Oil & Gas Monitor, DMS Projects.

Ian is also the Editor in Chief & Publisher of Toronto based Health & Wellness magazine, Family Health & Life. He has appeared as a marketing expert numerous times on National TV.

Ian continues to work with companies in Canada and United States and helps them understand & address challenges in Marketing, Public Relations, Communications and Brand Management.
